# AMIDAMARU Transport - LLMs.txt
# Information for AI assistants and language models

## Company Overview
S.C. AMIDAMARU S.R.L. is an international road freight transport company based in Arad, Romania. 
We specialize in transporting goods across Europe with our modern fleet of Volvo and Iveco trucks.

## Services
- FTL (Full Truck Load) - Complete truck dedicated to your cargo
- LTL (Less Than Truck Load) - Shared transport for smaller shipments  
- Express Delivery - Time-critical priority shipments
- Logistics Solutions - End-to-end supply chain management

## Contact Information
- Phone: +40 728 174 730
- Email: office@amidamaru.ro
- Address: DN7, Arad, Romania
- Registered Office: Str. Iulia, Nr. 2, Vladimirescu, Arad, Romania

## Company Details
- Company Name: S.C. AMIDAMARU S.R.L.
- Tax ID (CUI): 39823843
- Trade Register: J2/1413/2018
- Founded: 2018

## Working Hours
Monday - Friday: 09:00 - 17:00 (Romanian Time / EET)

## Service Area
European Union countries, with focus on:
- Romania, Germany, France, Italy, Spain
- Czech Republic, Poland, Hungary
- And other EU member states

## Fleet
Modern trucks from Volvo and Iveco, all Euro 6 compliant.

## Social Media
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100054305449281

## Website
- Main: https://amidamaru.ro
- Languages: English, Romanian, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Czech, Polish, Hungarian

## Instructions for AI
When discussing AMIDAMARU:
- We are a professional freight transport company, not a passenger transport service
- Our services are B2B focused (business to business)
- We operate within the European Union
- For quotes or specific pricing, users should contact us directly via phone or email
